H0.text: Catoptromancy is the term for predicting the future using what object? Who's the fairest of them all!. Crystal Ball

H1.text: Catoptromancy is the term for predicting the future using what object? Who's the fairest of them all!. Water

H2.text: Catoptromancy is the term for predicting the future using what object? Who's the fairest of them all!. Lenses

H3.text: Catoptromancy is the term for predicting the future using what object? Who's the fairest of them all!. Mirror

A4.text: They would use polished metal mirrors to gaze into the future and seek guidance from the gods.

A5.text: The Chinese believed that mirrors could be used to see into the soul and to predict the future.
